item.description:
Aaron Parker is hosting this excellent event at his family's place in West Falmouth. Start saving seeds now (see message boards for additional resources about seed saving if needed).

Bring seeds, perennial divisions, small trees/shrubs and food cultures (such as kombucha mothers or kefir grains) to trade. It will be a mini barter fair for permaculture goodies.

This is not a potluck event but hot cider will be provided compliments of this meetup group. Bring a mug. Bring your friends!

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Greater Portland Seed & Perennial Swap
